item.title: Just Enough GPG for git
item.description: It came about that I wanted to do some work with git and signed tags. It’s been a while since I had looked at this, I’ve got some old entries up on keyservers that date back to 1999, and never on a Mac. It turns out that it is quite simple to set up a minimal GPG environment â€“ one that lets you work on the command line without having to set it up for Mail.
